attributes.action: Pregnant women should be given blue parking badges for final months.
attributes.additional_details:
Pregnant women should not be considered disabled but one would find it hard to argue against this plan if you have been or helped a women through the last months of pregnancy. Making these women's lives a little easier and safer is surely something we should aspire to.

I propose that all women from their 7th month for 3 months (to include immediately after birth) should be routinely given a blue badge to be given the same rights to priority parking as a disabled person.

Rough calculations show a possible 5% increase in blue badges.

The costs would be minimal, with regular scheduled doctors appointments they could be given out with strict expiry dates.

I have yet to meet anyone with a reason not to support this so please sign this petition to have it debated.

Thanks
